and.attribute: Office 7, Floor 3, Anna Building, Quang Trung Software City, Tan Chanh Hiep Ward, District 12, Ho Chi Minh City

- Maintain and develop new features for investment and asset management application - Participate in analyzing requirements, design architecture, implementation, test and deployment process. - Daily meetings with customer over Skype in English - Start date: immediately

- Experienced in agile software development methods (such as Scrum or Kanban) or eager to learn them. - Excellent spoken and written command of English. - Able to adjust your working time according the the project schedule. - 2 years experience in J2SE/J2EE/MySQL. - You have good knowledge of frameworks such as Vaadin and Spring. - HTML5/CSS3 is no challenge and you keep up to date with web trends/standards. Boilerplate/Bootstrap/Foundation are no strangers to you. - Experienced in JavaScript and familiar with libraries such as jQuery - Accounting / banking knowledge is beneficial Please submit your CV with focus on what you have accomplished in the past and send it to our HR Dept via email We look forward to meeting you. and.attribute: http://www.swissitbridge.ch swiss IT bridge is a software development outsourcing company founded in 2006. We focus on custom web applications based on .NET and PHP. Our customers are mainly from Switzerland and Germany. We offer a professional environment which promotes your personal and professional development, a modern workplace with lots of windows and plenty natural lighting as well as a competitive salary package: - Opportunities to advance professionally and personally due to regular performance retrospectives. - Attractive labour contract with 100% net income, 13th month salary, loyalty bonus, quarterly performance bonus and more. - Regular Team activities (team buildings, company trips, etc.) - Working hours from Monday to Friday.
